title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama repo: self-contained CLI and server that runs Llama-2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally on macOS, Linux, Windows.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package that plugs Ollama into LangChain LLM, Chat and Embeddings interfaces.

title: ollama-webui (open-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ex-ollama-webui) with chat history, RAG, user auth, admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous & async APIs, streaming, custom timeouts.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Streamlit app that builds a RAG pipeline over local documents using Ollama embeddings.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS-Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot chat requests to your local Ollama model.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Simple Python CLI for interactive multi-line chat sessions with Ollama; supports conversation memory.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that answers prompts via your self-hosted Ollama instance; slash commands & thread support.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin to run and chat with Ollama models inside the editor; customizable prompts.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart that deploys Ollama server and models onto Kubernetes with GPU node-selector.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with async methods for chat, completion and embeddings; supports streaming.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app + REST endpoints that wrap Ollama for internal services; includes admin UI to manage models.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated list of custom Modelfiles and quantized models ready for ollama pull.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Lightweight Slack bot server that forwards channel messages to Ollama and posts replies.

title: ollama-rust-client
summary: Rust crate published on crates.io offering ergonomic APIs for chat, generate and embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-rag-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that builds a local RAG index over your vault using Ollama embeddings for semantic search.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot starter that autoconfigures an Ollama client bean and YAML-based model settings.
